Name: Invasion
About the game: Invasion Story: The colony on Mars had been silent for a long time. According to the last reports, critical discoveries were made about the existence of water and life. You should investigate the sectors and the surrounding area to find out why colony can not be heard from and learn what happened. Gameplay and Key Features: Science-fiction themed Dazzling space atmosphere Standard fps mechanics 7 Levels with 6 different weapons Action - adventure - thriller Opportunity to explore new worlds Option to start any chapter from Chapter Selection Option to play the story with pixel-based graphics for retro lovers Option to play Early Access TPS mode Developer's Note: The other stages of our project, which we continue to develop as an indie team, will be with you in the forthcoming years as VR, iOS, and Android support as well as multiplayer adaptation of games.
Meta Title: Invasion: Apr 25, 2019, CDIS Lab. and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Invasion? Check out the release date (Apr 25, 2019), developer insights from CDIS Lab., and a complete game summary.
